Contributor: Dyson, Will, 1880-1938, artist.; Avenue Press, printer.;
Note: Date based on dates of 1st World War. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text tells of Will Dyson's War Cartoon's Exhibition on July 3rd to the 8th. The admission was free. Illustration shows an example of a war cartoon. A strange round figure, a German soldier is seen looking through binoculars at another strange figure with angel wings from which hands hang.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I

Title: Will Dyson's war cartoons
